properties.description: Linked Service for Connecting to ADLS Gen2 Instance "logadlsoindrila2022march" from ADF Instance "ADF-Oindrila-2022-March" for Logging.

activities.name: Find SQL Server Password KV Secret
activities.description: Fetch the Value of the Secret "kv-sqlserveroindrila2022march-pwd" from the Azure Key Vault resource “KV-Oindrila-2022-March”

activities.name: Copy SQL Table into CSV File
activities.description: Copy the Records of the Azure SQL Database Table "dbo.Employee" and Store the Records as a CSV File in ADLS Gen2.

dependsOn.activity: Find SQL Server Password KV Secret

activities.name: Find SQL Server Password KV Secret
activities.description: Fetch the Value of the Secret "kv-sqlserveroindrila2022march-pwd" from the Azure Key Vault resource “KV-Oindrila-2022-March”

activities.name: Merge Data from Multiple Files to SQL Table
activities.description: Copy Data from the Multiple CSV Files Present in the "Hierarchy" of "Sub-Directories" inside the Directory "input-csv-files" under the Container "raw" and Store the Merged Data into the SQL Table "dbo.StudentMarks".

dependsOn.activity: Find SQL Server Password KV Secret

activities.name: Copy CSV Files Preserving Directory Hierarchy
activities.description: Copy the CSV File from the Input Directory "input-csv-files" under the Input Container "raw", Preserving the Directory Hierarchy, to the Output Directory "copy-data-output/pl-copy-data-activity" under the Output Container "stage".

activities.name: Copy CSV Files Flattening Directory Hierarchy
activities.description: Copy the CSV File from the Input Directory "input-csv-files" under the Input Container "raw", Flattening the Directory Hierarchy, to the Output Directory "copy-data-output/pl-copy-data-activity" under the Output Container "stage".

activities.name: Get Metadata of Folder
activities.description:
Get the following Metadata information of the Folder, Pointed by the Pipeline Parameters "param_containerName" and "param_directoryName" -

1. Type
2. Exists
3. Name
4. Child Items
5. Last Modified Date and Time

activities.name: Verify Item Type is Folder
activities.description: Verify If the Item, Pointed by the Dataset “DS_CSV_With_Contaner_Directory_Params” is a "Folder", or, Not.

ifFalseActivities.name: Set Item Type As File
ifFalseActivities.description: Set the Value of the Pipeline Variable "itemType" with the Text "This is a File".

ifTrueActivities.name: Set Item Type As Folder
ifTrueActivities.description: Set the Value of the Pipeline Variable "itemType" with the Text "This is a Folder".

activities.name: Get Metadata of File
activities.description:
Get the following Metadata information of the File, Pointed by the Pipeline Parameters "param_containerName", "param_directoryName" and "param_fileName" -

1. Column count
2. Exists
3. Item Name
4. Item Type
5. Last Modified Date and Time
6. Size
7. Structure

activities.name: Verify Item Type is File
activities.description: Verify If the Item, Pointed by the Dataset “DS_CSV_With_Contaner_Directory_File_Params” is a "File", or, Not.

ifFalseActivities.name: Set Item Type As Folder
ifFalseActivities.description: Set the Value of the Pipeline Variable "itemType" with the Text "This is a Folder".

ifTrueActivities.name: Set Item Type As File
ifTrueActivities.description: Set the Value of the Pipeline Variable "var_itemType" with the Text "This is a File".

activities.name: Validation of ADLS Directory in Dataset
activities.description: Verify if the Directory "input-json-files"  Exists under the Container "raw"

activities.name: Verify If Directory Exists
activities.description: Verify If the "Validation" Activity is Returning "true" or "false".

dependsOn.activity: Validation of ADLS Directory in Dataset

ifFalseActivities.name: Set Negative To Directory Exists Variable_copy1
ifFalseActivities.description: Set the Value "No. The Directory Does Not Exist" in the Pipeline Variable "var_ifDirectoryExists".

typeProperties.value: No. The Directory Does Not Exist

ifTrueActivities.name: Set Affirmative To Directory Exists Variable
ifTrueActivities.description: Set the Value "Yes. Directory Exists" in the Pipeline Variable "var_ifDirectoryExists".

activities.name: Find SQL Server Password KV Secret
activities.description: Fetch the Value of the Secret "kv-sqlserveroindrila2022march-pwd" from the Azure Key Vault resource “KV-Oindrila-2022-March”

activities.name: Lookup Table Employee
activities.description: Use this "Lookup" Activity to Execute the Query, Provided in the Pipeline Parameter "param_sqlQuery".

dependsOn.activity: Find SQL Server Password KV Secret

activities.name: Iterate Each Row of Lookup Output
activities.description: Iterate Over Each Row of the Output of the Previous "Lookup" Activity that Executes the Query, Provided in the Pipeline Parameter "param_sqlQuery".

activities.name: Copy Each Output Row of Lookup
activities.description: Copy Each "Output Row" of the "Lookup" Activity to the Directory “copy-data-output/pl-for-each-copy-data-activity” as a CSV File under the Container “stage” in the Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2 resource “adlsoindrila2022march”.

sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT Id, FirstName, LastName, Address FROM dbo.Employee WHERE Id = ''', item().Id, '''')

activities.name: Find SQL Server Password KV Secret
activities.description: Fetch the Value of the Secret "kv-sqlserveroindrila2022march-pwd" from the Azure Key Vault resource “KV-Oindrila-2022-March”

activities.name: Lookup Table Employee
activities.description: Use this "Lookup" Activity to Execute the Query, Provided in the Pipeline Parameter "param_sqlQuery".

dependsOn.activity: Find SQL Server Password KV Secret

activities.name: Iterate Each Row of Lookup Output
activities.description: Iterate Over Each Row of the Output of the Previous "Lookup" Activity that Executes the Query, Provided in the Pipeline Parameter "param_sqlQuery".

activities.name: Switch On City Values
activities.description: Depending on the Name of the "City", "Copy" the Data to Different Folders.

activities.name: Set Addres Variable To Kolkata
activities.description: Set the Value "Kolkata" as the Pipeline Variable "var_address" for the Selected Case "Kolkata".

activities.name: Set Addres Variable To Noida
activities.description: Set the Value "Noida" as the Pipeline Variable "var_address" for the Selected Case "Noida".

defaultActivities.name: Set Addres Variable To Other City
defaultActivities.description: Set the Value "Other City" as the Pipeline Variable "var_address" for the Default Case.

activities.name: Wait Until the File is Available
activities.description: Wait "Until" the File Becomes Available.

activities.name: Get Existence Metadata of CSV File
activities.description: Check the Existence of the File "Students_1.csv" in the Directory "input-csv-files/pl-until-file" Under the Container "raw" Using the "Exists" Field of "Get Metadata" Activity.

activities.name: Verify If File Exists
activities.description: Verify If the File "Students_1.csv" Exists in the Directory "input-csv-files/pl-until-file" Under the Container "raw".

dependsOn.activity: Get Existence Metadata of CSV File

ifFalseActivities.name: Set Negative to File Exists Variable
ifFalseActivities.description: Set the Value "false" to the Pipeline Variable "var_isFileAvailable".

ifTrueActivities.name: Set Affirmative to File Exists Variable
ifTrueActivities.description: Set the Value "true" to the Pipeline Variable "var_isFileAvailable".

activities.name: Wait Until the File is Available
activities.description: Wait "Until" the File Becomes Available.

activities.name: Get Existence Metadata of CSV File
activities.description: Check the Existence of the File "Students_1.csv" in the Directory "input-csv-files/pl-until-file" Under the Container "raw" Using the "Exists" Field of "Get Metadata" Activity.

activities.name: Verify If File Exists
activities.description: Verify If the File "Students_1.csv" Exists in the Directory "input-csv-files/pl-until-file" Under the Container "raw".

dependsOn.activity: Get Existence Metadata of CSV File

ifFalseActivities.name: Set Negative to File Exists Variable
ifFalseActivities.description: Set the Value "false" to the Pipeline Variable "var_isFileAvailable".

ifTrueActivities.name: Set Affirmative to File Exists Variable
ifTrueActivities.description: Set the Value "true" to the Pipeline Variable "var_isFileAvailable".

ifTrueActivities.name: Copy CSV File
ifTrueActivities.description: Copy the CSV File "Students_1.csv", When it Becomes Available, from the Input Directory "input-csv-files/pl-until-file" Under the Input Container "raw" to the Output Directory "copy-data-output/pl-delete-copy-data-activity" Under the Output Container "stage".

dependsOn.activity: Set Affirmative to File Exists Variable

ifTrueActivities.name: Delete Source CSV File
ifTrueActivities.description: After Copying, Delete the CSV File from the Directory "input-csv-files/pl-until-file" Under the Container "raw".

activities.name: Find SQL Server Password KV Secret
activities.description: Fetch the Value of the Secret "kv-sqlserveroindrila2022march-pwd" from the Azure Key Vault resource “KV-Oindrila-2022-March”

activities.name: Lookup Employee Table
activities.description: Use this "Lookup" Activity to Fetch the Result of the SQL Query "SELECT * FROM dbo.Employee WHERE Address = '" + param_address + "'".

dependsOn.activity: Find SQL Server Password KV Secret

activities.name: Verify Lookup Result
activities.description: Verify If the Previous Lookup Activity Returns Result Set

ifFalseActivities.name: Fail On Lookup Employee Table
ifFalseActivities.description: Provide the Error Message on Failure of the Previous Lookup Activity

message.value: @concat('The Employee Information Could Not be Found Living in the City "', pipeline().parameters.param_address, '"')

activities.name: Unzip the Zipped CSV Files
activities.description: Unzip the Zipped CSV Files from the Input Directory "input-zip-files" under the Input Container "raw" to the Output Directory "copy-data-output/pl-copy-unzip-file-activity" under the Output Container "stage".

activities.name: Find SQL Server Password KV Secret
activities.description: Fetch the Value of the Secret "kv-sqlserveroindrila2022march-pwd" from the Azure Key Vault resource “KV-Oindrila-2022-March”

activities.name: Lookup SP With Out Param Result
activities.description: Use this "Lookup" Activity to Call the Stored Procedure "dbo.SP_GetEmployeeDetails" to Fetch the Details of the Table "Employee" Based on the Provided Filter Value as Pipeline Parameter "param_address".

dependsOn.activity: Find SQL Server Password KV Secret

activities.name: Find SQL Server Password KV Secret
activities.description: Fetch the Value of the Secret "kv-sqlserveroindrila2022march-pwd" from the Azure Key Vault resource “KV-Oindrila-2022-March”

activities.name: Lookup SQL Query
activities.description: Use this "Lookup" Activity to Fetch the Result of the SQL Query "SELECT * FROM dbo.Employee WHERE Address = '" + param_address + "'".

dependsOn.activity: Find SQL Server Password KV Secret
